CustomField.description: Controls the verbosity of rollup logging. None disables logging entirely. Diagnostic logs high-level operational information (rollup names, query strings, query counts, major decisions). Debug logs everything for detailed troubleshooting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls the verbosity of rollup logging. None disables logging entirely. Diagnostic logs high-level operational information. Debug logs everything for detailed troubleshooting.
CustomField.label: Rollup Logging Level
